Claim: "Global warming leads to more frequent precipitation and improved soil moisture."
Implication: "Global warming is creating a safer, more peaceful world."
Referring expressions: Global warming, precipitation, soil moisture  Global warming, world
Formula: (exists c (exists a (exists b (IsLeadsTo(a,b) and IsImprovedSoilMoisture(c)))) & (forall e (forall f ( IsLeadsTo(e,f) ->  IsCreating(e))))) -> (exists a (exists d (IsCreating(a) and (IsSafer(d) and IsMorePeaceful(d)))))
